messages.subject: really DUMB postal question ...
messages.msgSnippet: HEY???  I ve got a ??? ... I just received a book I bought from ebay ... thankfully, the book arrived in perfect condition considering how it was mailed!!!
messages.messageBody:
HEY??? I've got a ??? ... I just received a book I bought from ebay ...
thankfully, the book arrived in perfect condition considering how it was
mailed!!! the person used a manilla envelope wrapped the book in bubble
wrap to protect the books but that's it!!! the other day I sold a book on
vegsource and I wrapped my pkg in a dept store shirt box BUT the postal
worker gave me the HARDEST TIME saying I couldn't insure the pkg b/c they
(po) wouldn't take responsibility since I'd used a shirt box ... HUH??? my
pkg was more securely wrapped (I love using tape, btw, lots and lots of tape
<G>) ... anyone have any postal experiences??? these people drive me
*crazy* or should I say *POSTAL*!!! haha ...

Pris ~> who'z scratchin her head over this one ...
